Plugin Text Command Description.message: Use {0} to open the the configuration window.

Results Subcommand Help Message.message: Opens a window containing the results of the last ready check to occur.

Clear Subcommand Help Message.message: Removes the most recent ready check icons from the party/alliance lists.

Debug Subcommand Help Message.message: Opens a debugging window containing party and ready check object data.

Basic Help Message.message: This plugin works automatically; however, some text commands are supported.  Valid subcommands are {0}, {1}, and {2}.  Use "{3} <subcommand>" for more information on each subcommand.

Config Option: Print Names of Unready in.message: Show the names of those not ready in the chat window.

Config Option: Max Names in Chat.message: Maximum number of names to show in chat:

Help: Chat Message Channel.message: Sets the channel in which this chat message is shown.  Leave this set to the default value ({0}) unless it causes problems with your chat configuration.  This only affects the unready players message; all other messages from this plugin respect your choice of chat channel in Dalamud settings.

Config Option: Draw on Party Alliance Li.message: Draw ready check on party/alliance lists.

Config Option: Clear Party Alliance List.message: Clear ready check from party/alliance lists:
Upon entering combat while in instance.
After a certain number of seconds:

Help: Clear Party Alliance List after X.message: Changes to this setting will not take effect until the next ready check concludes.

Config Section: Icon Size/Offset.message: Party and Alliance List Icon Size/Offset:

Placeholder: No Ready Check Results Exis.message: No ready check has yet occurred.

Window Title: Ready Check and Alliance D.message: Ready Check and Alliance Debug Data

Help: Debug Set Object Address Warning.message: DO NOT TOUCH THIS UNLESS YOU KNOW EXACTLY WHAT YOU'RE DOING AND WHY; THE ABSOLUTE BEST CASE IS A PLUGIN CRASH.
